    ts_missing <- subset_values(ts, 1:8)
fit <- mbtransfer(ts, P = 3, Q = 3)
ts_pred <- predict(fit, ts_missing)
    ws <- steps(c("pH" = TRUE, "AS" = FALSE), lengths = 4, L = 4) |>
  map(~ 2 * . + 5)
ws[[1]]["AS", ] <- 38
ws[[2]]["AS", ] <- 38
